original_title: Puerto Rico: Hope in the Dark
overview: "Puerto Rico: Hope in the Dark" is the story of the people of Puerto Rico and the faith, strength, and hope that has sustained them in the devastating aftermath of Hurricane Maria.
tagline: "Puerto Rico: Hope in the Dark" is the story of the people of Puerto Rico and the faith, strength, and hope that has sustained them in the devastating aftermath of Hurricane Maria.
title: Puerto Rico: Hope in the Dark
